metadata.Description: Gradual elimination of fossil fuel usage

fossil fuel phase-out.Description: Fossil fuel phase-out addresses air pollution by reducing the combustion of fossil fuels and transitioning to cleaner energy sources.
Fossil fuel phase-out employs renewable energy technologies as alternatives to fossil fuel-based energy generation.
Fossil fuel phase-out collaborates with environmental organizations to promote sustainable energy policies and advocate for the reduction of fossil fuel use.
Fossil fuel phase-out supports the transition to renewable energy sources by providing incentives and policies that promote their adoption.
Fossil fuel phase-out administers carbon pricing mechanisms to internalize the environmental costs of fossil fuel use and incentivize cleaner alternatives.
Fossil fuel phase-out measures greenhouse gas emissions to track progress in reducing carbon emissions and achieving climate goals.
Fossil fuel phase-out aligns with the goals and targets of the Paris Agreement to limit global warming and mitigate climate change.
Fossil fuel phase-out is an instance of a sustainable energy transition strategy that aims to reduce reliance on fossil fuels and promote renewable energy.
